attributes.action: Full disclosure of David Cameron's dinner guests
attributes.additional_details:
Following the resignation of Conservative Party’s co-treasurer Peter Cruddas, we petition for full disclosure of the names of those who have attended exclusive dinners in Mr Cameron's flat above No 10 Downing Street and Chequers since he became Prime Minister.

We believe that David Cameron should honour his promise to clean up politics and show that his government places the interests of the country above those of the Tory Party.
